rules_text:
Return up to two target permanent cards from your graveyard to your hand, then if Into the World was cast from exile, you may put a permanent card from your hand onto the battlefield.
Undercover [i](You may cast this face down as a 2/2 creature for {3}. When it dies while face down, exile it face down without revealing it and put a cover counter on it. Players may look at and cast face down cards they own exiled with cover counters.)[/i]
notes: New name, 6MV —> 5MV, Return three permanents —> Return two permanents, If cast from exile, exile yard face down —> If cast from exile, slam a guy
